welcome_message_body: Welcome to Higashimurayama, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, traditional temples, and vibrant local culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Ramen Kappa House (らーめん カッパハウス)
restaurants.description: Ramen Kappa House (らーめん カッパハウス) is a ramen restaurant located in 所沢市.

restaurants.address: 日吉町8-6 (所沢プロペ商店街), 所沢市, 埼玉県, 359-1123

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by connecting to the network and completing a short registration process.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
